name: STAR TREK 2: The Rush Of Khan
name_original: STAR TREK 2: The Rush Of Khan
description:
I wanted to make all my favourite bits from my most favourite star trek film. I got quite a way into it but ended up running out of time. I polished off what I had in about 3 hours to make it playable at least so please enjoy!

Progress was kinda documented on twitter @xopsx under #StarTrekJam

One day I may return to this game and finish it... I think there is a cool idea here :)

Thanks for swinging by!

@xopsx
